# Basketball Team - Final Architecture Instructions

## CURRENT STATE (Post-Template Integration)
- **Backend**: Node.js API fully functional (port 5000)
- **Frontend**: Sportpar template integrated in React (port 3000)
- **Status**: Template working identically to original

## KEY FILES
- `frontend/src/App.js` - Main template component (JSX conversion)
- `frontend/public/css/` - Template CSS assets
- `frontend/public/images/` - Template image assets
- `sportpar/` - Original template reference (DO NOT MODIFY)

## DEVELOPMENT COMMANDS
- Backend: `cd backend && npm run dev`
- Frontend: `cd frontend && npm start`
- Both accessible and functional
